mapper.select: select t.`orderNo` as `orderNo`, t.`totalAmount` as `totalAmount`, t.`commision` as `commision`, t.`InviteMoney` as `InviteMoney`, t.`createTime` as `createTime`, t.`commodityId` as `commodityId`, t.`orderAmout` as `orderAmout`, t.`status` as `status`, c.`name` as `name`, c.`coverImagePath` as `coverImagePath` from `t_thinkingfruit_mall_commision` as t left join `t_thinkingfruit_mall_commodity` as c on t.`commodityId`=c.`id` where t.`memberId` = #{id}
